;===============================================================
;== TRIGGER DATA STARTS HERE ==
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1085_Start_Battle_Enemy_Forming_For_Attack_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattleAiAttacking

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Enemy_Forming_For_Attack_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1086_Start_Battle_Enemy_On_Defensive_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and not I_BattleAiAttacking
          and not I_BattleAiDefendingHill

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Enemy_On_Defensive_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1087_Start_Battle_Enemy_Defending_One_Crossing_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattleAiDefendingCrossing
          and I_BattleNumberOfRiverCrossings > 1

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Enemy_Defending_One_Crossing_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1088_Start_Battle_Withdraw_Now_Run_Away_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerAllianceOddsAgainst > 7
          and RandomPercent = 1

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Withdraw_Now_Run_Away_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1089_Start_Battle_Enemy_Scouting_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattleAiScouting

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Enemy_Scouting_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1091_Start_Battle_Enemy_Defending_Only_Crossing_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition I_BattleAiDefendingCrossing
          and I_BattleNumberOfRiverCrossings = 1

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Enemy_Defending_Only_Crossing_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1092_Start_Battle_Missiles_Engage_Centre_Then_Assault_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass heavy >= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry >= 15
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile > 25
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile <= 15
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry <= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory missile siege <= 20
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass skirmish <= 15

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Missiles_Engage_Centre_Then_Assault_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1093_Cannon_Fodder_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile >= 25

    AdviceThread Cannon_Fodder_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1094_Enemy_Missile_Superiority_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile >= 25
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile <= 15

    AdviceThread Enemy_Missile_Superiority_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1190A_Offer_Bait_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory light cavalry >= 1

    AdviceThread Offer_Bait_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1190B_Offer_Bait_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory light infantry >= 1

    AdviceThread Offer_Bait_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1194_Look_At_Their_Lines_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattleAiAttacking

    AdviceThread Look_At_Their_Lines_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1196_Outnumbering_The_Enemy_10to1_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerAllianceOddsInFavour > 10

    AdviceThread Outnumbering_The_Enemy_10to1_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1070_Siege_Advice_Equipment_Battering_Ram_Breaks_Through_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleBattleGatesDestroyedByEngine

    Condition I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

    AdviceThread Siege_Advice_Equipment_Battering_Ram_Breaks_Through_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1071_Siege_Advice_Equipment_Battering_Ram_Breaks_Through_Your_Gate_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleBattleGatesDestroyedByEngine

    Condition I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

    AdviceThread Siege_Advice_Equipment_Battering_Ram_Breaks_Through_Your_Gate_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1083A_Siege_Advice_Equipment_Attack_Onagers_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 0
          and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and I_BattleAttackerNumSiegeEngines heavy_onager >= 1

    AdviceThread Siege_Advice_Equipment_Attack_Onagers_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1083B_Siege_Advice_Equipment_Attack_Onagers_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 0
          and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and I_BattleAttackerNumSiegeEngines onager >= 1

    AdviceThread Siege_Advice_Equipment_Attack_Onagers_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1095A_Hit_Sitting_Targets_With_Missiles_1_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile >= 1

    AdviceThread Hit_Sitting_Targets_With_Missiles_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1099_Missile_Attack_Before_Engaging_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile >= 1

    AdviceThread Missile_Attack_Before_Engaging_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1100_Cavalry_In_Reserve_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry >= 20

    AdviceThread Cavalry_In_Reserve_Thread  1

          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry >= 10

Trigger 1108_Flanking_With_Cavalry_2_Trigger

          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle

          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass spearmen >= 1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1109_Flanking_With_Cavalry_And_Infantry_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry >= 1
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy infantry >= 1

    AdviceThread Flanking_With_Cavalry_And_Infantry_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1110_Infantry_Combine_Unit_Types_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile >= 1
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory infantry >= 1
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry >= 1

    AdviceThread Infantry_Combine_Unit_Types_Thread  1

Trigger 1072_Siege_Advice_Equipment_Defence_Battering_Rams_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleGatesAttackedByEnemyEngine

    Condition I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and BattleEnemyUnitSiegeEngineClass = ram
          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 2

    AdviceThread Siege_Advice_Equipment_Defence_Battering_Rams_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger 1273_Concentrate_Fire_On_Walls_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerAttacksSettlementBuilding

    Condition I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattleAttackerNumArtilleryCanPenetrateWalls >= 1
          and BattlePlayerUnitSiegeEngineClass != tower
          and BattlePlayerUnitSiegeEngineClass != ram
          and BattlePlayerUnitSiegeEngineClass != ladder
          and BattlePlayerUnitSiegeEngineClass != sap_point
          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 3

    AdviceThread Concentrate_Fire_On_Walls_Thread  1

          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and not BattleIsMeleeAttack

          and BattleEnemyUnitClass = missile
          and BattleEnemyUnitOnWalls

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and BattlePlayerUnitCategory = infantry
          and BattlePlayerUnitClass != missile
          and BattleEnemyUnitCategory = infantry
          and BattleEnemyUnitClass != missile
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile >= 1
          and BattlePlayerActionStatus = missiles_firing

          and not BattlePlayerUnitSpecialAbilityActive

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMatchingUnits horse_archers >= 1
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMatchingUnits horse_javelinmen = 0

    AdviceThread Cavalry_Archers_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1162_Cavalry_Cycle_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition BattlePlayerUnitCategory = cavalry
          and BattlePlayerMountClass != elephant
          and BattlePlayerUnitClass != missile
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/sons_of_mars/descr_strat.txt

Trigger 2018_City_Riots_Reduce_Taxes_Trigger
    WhenToTest SettlementSelected

    Condition SettlementIsLocal
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Mechanics
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Troops
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Buildings
          and SettlementTaxLevel > tax_high
          and IsSettlementRioting

    AdviceThread City_Riots_Reduce_Taxes_Thread  1

          and not IsSettlementGarrisoned
          and IsSettlementRioting

    AdviceThread City_Riots_Garrison_Properly_Thread  1

Trigger 2023_City_Loyalty_Low_High_Tax_Reduce_or_Garrison_Trigger
    WhenToTest SettlementTurnStart

    Condition SettlementIsLocal
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Mechanics
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Troops
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Buildings
          and SettlementLoyaltyLevel <= loyalty_content
          and SettlementTaxLevel >= tax_high

    AdviceThread City_Loyalty_Low_High_Tax_Reduce_or_Garrison_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 2024_City_Health_Low_No_Sewers_Plague_Risk_Trigger
    WhenToTest SettlementTurnStart

    Condition SettlementIsLocal
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Mechanics
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Troops
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Buildings
          and SettlementBuildingExists < sewers
          and not FactionCultureType barbarian
          and HealthPercentage < 50
          and not SettlementHasPlague

    AdviceThread City_Health_Low_No_Sewers_Plague_Risk_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

    Condition SettlementIsLocal
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Buildings
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= sewers
          and not FactionCultureType barbarian
          and HealthPercentage < 70

    AdviceThread City_Health_Slow_Breeding_Effect_Thread  1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 2029_Faction_Negative_Cashflow_Low_Reserve_High_Tax_Trigger
    WhenToTest SettlementTurnStart

    Condition SettlementIsLocal
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Mechanics
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Buildings
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Troops
          and LosingMoney
          and ModeTaxLevel = tax_extortionate
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/sons_of_mars/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Faction_Negative_Cashflow_Low_Reserve_High_Tax_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 2030_Faction_Negative_Cashflow_Low_Reserve_High_Tax_Overdrawn_Trigger
    WhenToTest SettlementTurnStart

    Condition SettlementIsLocal
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Mechanics
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Buildings
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Troops
          and LosingMoney
          and ModeTaxLevel = tax_extortionate
          and Treasury < 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/sons_of_mars/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Faction_Negative_Cashflow_Low_Reserve_High_Tax_Overdrawn_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest SettlementTurnStart

    Condition SettlementIsLocal
          and LosingMoney
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Mechanics
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Buildings
          and not SettlementAutoManaged Troops
          and ModeTaxLevel <= tax_normal
          and Treasury > 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/sons_of_mars/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Faction_Cashflow_Tax_Oversight_Problem_Thread  1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Facing_The_Francisca_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleDeploymentPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMatchingUnits foot_francisca >= 1

    AdviceThread Facing_The_Francisca_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Using_The_Francisca_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleDeploymentPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfMatchingUnits foot_francisca >= 1

    AdviceThread Using_The_Francisca_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfSpecialAbility shield_wall >= 1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Facing_Swimmers_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition I_BattleIsRiverBattle
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageCanSwim >= 1

    AdviceThread Facing_Swimmers_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Using_Swimmers_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition I_BattleIsRiverBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageCanSwim >= 1

    AdviceThread Using_Swimmers_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Night_Battles_Trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait Noctophilia >= 1

    AdviceThread Night_Battles_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Blokes_Going_Berserk_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition BattlePlayerActionStatus = go_berserk

    AdviceThread Blokes_Going_Berserk_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Their_Blokes_Going_Berserk_Thread
    WhenToTest BattleEnemyUnitAttacksPlayerUnit

    Condition BattleEnemyActionStatus = go_berserk

    AdviceThread Their_Blokes_Going_Berserk_Thread  1
